src:
Zbog tuče, po dve utakmice suspenzije za zvezde NBA lige
01 Nov 2019, 11:41 by Nemanja
Centri Filadelfija Seventisiksersa i Minesota Timbervulfsa Džoel Embid i Karl Entoni Tauns suspenodvani su na dve utakmice zbog fizičkog sukoba na utakmici odigranoj u četvrtak.
Dvojica košarkaša su se sukobila u šestom minutu treće deonice, nakon čega su ih saigrači i članovi stručnog štaba jedva razdvojili. Odlikom sudija, obojica su isključena, a dan nakon meča NBA liga im je izrekla suspenzije, zbog kojih će propustiti dva naredna meča.
Embid neće igrati mečeve protiv Portlanda i Finiksa, dok će Tauns biti odsutan protiv Vašingtona i Milvokija.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Because of the brawl, a two-game suspension for the NBA League stars each
01 Nov 2019, 11:41 by Nemanja
Philadelphia Seventhisksers and Minnesota Timberwolves centers Joel Embid and Carl Anthony Towns have been suspended for two games due to physical conflict at a game played Thursday.
The two basketball players clashed in the sixth minute of the third leg, after which they were barely separated by teammates and professional staff members. With the judges' excellence, they were both ruled out, and the day after the NBA league, they were suspended, missing two of their next matches.
Embidy will not play matches against Portland and Phoenix, while Towns will be absent against Washington and Milwaukee.
